backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining product and order types, a static product list, an orders map, and query functions for retrieving products.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing completed UI removal tasks (email, Facebook) with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files, including routing, state, components, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and applying them to body and elements.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for home, about, products, and contact pages using AppShell as root.
frontend/src/components/cart/CartLineIte: Renders a cart item row with image, name, quantity controls, and remove button.
frontend/src/components/cart/StickyCartB: Placeholder component returning null to satisfy module requirements.
frontend/src/components/checkout/Checkou: Checkout form managing customer input, validation, and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/checkout/OrderSu: Displays a summary of cart items and shipping destination without price information.
frontend/src/components/contact/Floating: Floating WhatsApp quick-chat button linking to a generated WhatsApp URL.
frontend/src/components/contact/WhatsApp: Standard WhatsApp button with icon and label linking to a generated WhatsApp URL.
Defines the main app layout including header, footer, routed content, and a floating WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with branding, contact info, social links, and copyright text.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Provides the main navigation bar with responsive mobile menu, logo, nav links, and publish/share dialog trigger.
frontend/src/components/media/Responsive: Simple wrapper for a responsive lazy-loading image element.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Displays a product with image, category label, description, and a WhatsApp contact button.
frontend/src/components/publish/PublishS: Implements a dialog that shows and copies the site's shareable URL.
frontend/src/components/shipping/Interna: Shows a small callout highlighting international shipping availability.
frontend/src/components/shipping/Shippin: Renders a styled list of countries the business ships to.
frontend/src/constants/contact.ts: Centralized contact details including phone, WhatsApp, and email info.
frontend/src/constants/copy.ts: Centralized text constants for navigation, UI labels, shipping, cart, checkout, contact, footer, and publish dialogs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication via Internet Identity, exposing identity state, login, and logout functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines product, order, and order-placement queries using the backend actor, including filtering logic for product lists.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines extensive light/dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page with sections describing heritage, quality, and international reach.
frontend/src/pages/CartCheckoutPage.tsx: Placeholder component that returns null because checkout functionality is removed.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact details, WhatsApp button, social links, and business hours.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with hero banner, product highlights, CTAs, and international shipping callouts.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays products with loading/error states and filters out a specific item before rendering.
frontend/src/state/cart/CartContext.tsx: Provides cart state management including add, update, remove, clear, subtotal, and persistence in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/state/cart/cartSelectors.ts: Utility functions to calculate line totals and subtotal for cart items.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Builds a WhatsApp message URL using stored contact information and an optional custom message.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Describes the project's shift to a contactâ€‘based site, notes removal of cart/checkout, and lists related runtime issues and missing contact wiring. Also includes existing feature definitions and a flag indicating this is a fix request.
